caption.title: Smoothed rainfall seasonality at the CIMH synoptic station in Barbados.
caption.p: The chance of a wet day (i.e., a calendar day with >0.85 mm; left panel) and the average rainfall intensity on a wet day for each Julian day of the year (right panel). Source: modified from Trotman and colleagues [ 20]. CIMH, Caribbean Institute for Meteorology and Hydrology.
Click here for additional data file.
